attributes.action: Only NATIONWIDE political parties to join in debates.
attributes.additional_details: Parties which do not put up candidates UK NATIONWIDE - SNP, Plaid Cymru, DUP, Alliance etc - MUST not be allowed to debate with political parties which DO put up candidates  UK NATIONWIDE.  This is a democracy and the parties which matter are those which ANY citizen of the UK can vote for.  It is undemocratic to have SNP, for example, politicians dictating policy on matters for which those who would be affected by the outcome who CANNOT vote on those politicians being in or out of office.
